item.title: Airbnb因强劲的季度业绩和扩张计划而股价大涨
item.description: 周五盘前交易中，Airbnb 股价最高上涨 13.3%，此前这家度假房屋租赁公司第四季度业绩超出华尔街预期，主要受强劲的国际旅游需求提振。【原文：Airbnb shares rose as much as 13.3% in premarket trade on Friday after the vacation home rentals company beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter results, boosted by strong international travel demand.】

item.title: 欧洲股市反弹，全球股票基金吸引资金流入
item.description: 在英国央行降息推动欧股反弹之后，全球股票基金在截至2月12日的一周内吸引了大量资金流入，尽管对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税政策的谨慎态度限制了投资者的活动。【原文：Global equity funds attracted significant inflows in the week ending February 12, after a Bank of England rate cut drove a rally in European shares, although caution over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies limited investor activity.】

item.title: 投资者连续两周撤出美国股票基金
item.description: 截至2月12日，美国投资者连续第二周撤出股票基金，原因是通胀上升、经济数据疲软以及对唐纳德-特朗普总统征收对等关税的担忧，从而抑制了风险偏好。【原文：U.S. investors pulled out of equity funds for the second consecutive week through February 12, driven by rising inflation, weaker economic data and concerns over President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs, dampening risk appetite.】

item.title: 疫苗制造商缩减生产规模，Moderna亏损超预期
item.description: Moderna周五公布的季度亏损超过了预期，原因是在COVID-19疫苗需求疲软的情况下，该公司缩减了生产规模。【原文：Moderna reported a bigger-than-expected quarterly loss on Friday, hit by a charge related to its efforts to scale down manufacturing amid weakening demand for its COVID-19 vaccine.】

item.title: 中国人工智能企业以交易和低成本模式成为焦点
item.description: 阿里巴巴本周宣布将与苹果公司合作，为中国的 iPhone 人工智能服务提供支持，继 DeepSeek 之后，中国的人工智能产业再次成为焦点。【原文：Alibaba's announcement this week that it will partner with Apple to support iPhones' artificial intelligence services offering in China has again thrust the spotlight on the country's AI industry on the heels of DeepSeek.】

item.title: 烟草公司 JTI 预测，廉价香烟将继续抢占美国市场份额
item.description: 日本烟草国际公司财务总监告诉路透社，预计到 2027 年，美国市场向廉价卷烟品牌的转变将达到 40% 以上。【原文：Japan Tobacco International expects a shift towards cheaper cigarette brands in the United States to reach more than 40% of the market by 2027, its finance chief told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普发出威胁后，加拿大国旗销量激增
item.description: 加拿大旗帜制造商 Flags Unlimited 的销售额比一年前翻了一番，该公司的所有者说，这是因为与邻国美国的紧张关系助长了爱国主义浪潮。【原文：Canadian flagmaker Flags Unlimited's sales have doubled from a year earlier, the company's owners said, as tensions with the neighboring United States fuel a wave of patriotism.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 沃尔玛将揭示消费者健康状况，通胀咄咄逼人，关税风起云涌
item.description: 沃尔玛下周发布的季报将让投资者对美国消费者的健康状况有新的认识，他们正面临着更强劲的通胀以及唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税是否会推高物价的不确定性。【原文：Walmart's quarterly report in the coming week will give investors fresh insight into the health of U.S. consumers, who are facing stronger inflation and uncertainty over whether President Donald Trump's tariffs will push up prices.】

item.title: 印度今年将在全球招标 114 架战斗机
item.description: 两位消息人士称，印度很可能在今年就114架多功能战斗机进行招标，这标志着印度在近20年的战斗机储备扩充进程中迈出了重要一步。【原文：India is likely to seek bids this year for 114 multi-role fighters, two sources said, marking a major step in a process to bolster the country's stock of combat aircraft that has gone on for nearly two decades.】

item.title: 早间竞价：关税延迟、收益率回落，无望美元受挫
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 为延长特朗普 2017 年的减税政策，共和党人试图忽略成本问题
item.description: 在国会共和党人试图延长唐纳德-特朗普总统 2017 年的减税政策之际，一些共和党人正在考虑一项不同寻常的计划，既能使减税政策永久化，又能避免为减税而大规模削减开支所带来的政治痛苦：辩称减税不会加深联邦赤字。【原文：As congressional Republicans try to extend President Donald Trump's 2017 tax cuts, some are considering an unusual plan to make them permanent while avoiding the political pain of massive spending cuts to pay for them: Argue that they will not deepen the federal deficit.】

item.title: 特朗普和马斯克向美国政府办公室开炮，数千人被解雇
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统和最高顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）推行政府大规模裁员，焦虑不安的美国联邦政府工作人员预计将在周五看到新一轮的粉红纸条。【原文：Anxious U.S. federal workers are expected to see another round of pink slips on Friday as President Donald Trump and top adviser Elon Musk pursue a wholesale downsizing of the government.】

item.title: 特朗普关闭了 "微量 "进口漏洞--直到一切都乱套了
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普终止对进入美国的廉价中国商品免税入境的几天后，他的政府在纽约约翰-肯尼迪国际机场堆积了超过一百万个包裹后搁置了这一命令。【原文：Days after U.S. President Donald Trump ended duty-free entry for cheap Chinese goods entering the U.S., his administration put the order on hold after more than a million packages piled up at New York's John F. Kennedy International Airport.】

item.title: 最易被美援署淘汰的新兴经济体
item.description: 如果按照特朗普政府的提议解散美国国际开发署，饱受战争蹂躏的国家、债台高筑的国家和美国的盟国（如约旦）损失最大。【原文：War-torn countries, those with high levels of debt and U.S. allies such as Jordan have the most to lose if the United States Agency for International Development is dismantled, as proposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 市场等待关税细节，期货市场停滞不前
item.description: 美国股指期货周五暂停交易，因为投资者在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税计划的进一步明朗化，在此之前的几个交易日，美国股指强劲上涨，三大基准股指都将实现强劲的周涨幅。【原文：U.S. stock index futures paused on Friday, as investors awaited more clarity on U.S. President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff plans following robust gains in the last sessions, with all three benchmark stock indexes set for strong weekly gains.】

item.title: 中国房地产贷款收缩在政府支持后有所缓解
item.description: 央行周五公布的数据显示，截至第四季度末，中国未偿还的房地产贷款下降了0.2%，低于上年同期1%的降幅，这表明政府扶持房地产市场的努力已初见成效。【原文：China's outstanding property loans were down 0.2% at the end of the fourth quarter, less than the prior year's 1% decline, central bank data showed on Friday, indicating government efforts to bolster the market were beginning to take effect.】

item.title: 欧盟表示将坚决反对美国对等提高关税
item.description: 负责协调欧盟 27 国贸易政策的欧盟委员会认为，拟议的政策是朝着错误方向迈出的一步。【原文：The European Commission, which coordinates trade policy for the 27-nation European Union, described the proposed policy as a step in the wrong direction.】

item.title: 基辅消息人士称乌克兰向美国递交矿产交易草案
item.description: 参加慕尼黑安全会议的乌克兰代表团的一位消息人士周五告诉路透社记者，乌克兰已经完成了矿产协议草案的起草工作，并已将其交给美国审查。【原文：Ukraine has finished work on a draft minerals agreement and handed it over to the United States for review, a source in the Ukrainian delegation at the Munich Security Conference told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 中国 1 月银行贷款因政策刺激创历史新高
item.description: 1 月份，中国新增银行贷款超预期飙升至历史新高，因为中国央行开始采取行动支撑零星的经济复苏，这增强了人们对未来几个月将采取更多刺激措施的预期。【原文：New bank loans in China surged more than expected to an all-time high in January as the central bank moved to shore up a patchy economic recovery, reinforcing expectations for more stimulus in the coming months.】

item.title: 微软高管：人工智能将改变财富管理模式
item.description: 微软公司的一位高管表示，人工智能将给财富管理带来重大变革，因为该技术处理信息的潜力大大降低了与老牌银行竞争所需的障碍。【原文：Artificial intelligence will bring major upheaval to wealth management, a Microsoft executive said, as the technology's potential to process information vastly reduces the hurdles required to compete with established banks.】

item.title: 美国对俄罗斯的最新制裁使全球石油贸易陷入混乱
item.description: 美国收紧对莫斯科的制裁扰乱了俄罗斯向中国和印度提供折扣石油的蓬勃贸易，重新刺激了对中东和非洲原油的需求，扰乱了航运市场并推高了油价。【原文：Tightened U.S. sanctions on Moscow have disrupted a roaring trade in discounted Russian oil to China and India, reviving demand for Middle Eastern and African crudes, roiling shipping markets and driving up oil prices.】

item.title: 英国研究显示，人工智能生成的内容会引发更多银行挤兑风险
item.description: 英国一项新的研究指出，人工智能生成并在社交媒体上传播的假新闻正在增加银行挤兑的风险。【原文：Fake news generated by artificial intelligence and spread on social media is heightening the risks of bank runs, according to a new British study that says lenders must improve monitoring to detect when disinformation risks impacting customer behaviour.】

item.title: 据 Cinco Dias 报道，西班牙电信聘请摩根大通出售墨西哥业务
item.description: 西班牙电信集团 Telefonica 已聘请投资银行摩根大通（JPMorgan）出售其墨西哥业务。【原文：Spanish telecom group Telefonica has hired investment bank JPMorgan to sell its Mexican business, newspaper Cinco Dias reported on Friday, citing unidentified financial sources.】

item.title: 迪拜与埃隆-马斯克的基础设施公司签署迪拜环线项目协议
item.description: 迪拜媒体办公室在一份声明中说，迪拜王储谢赫哈姆丹-本-穆罕默德-本-拉希德-马克图姆（Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum）周五与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的基础设施公司 Boring Company 签署了迪拜环线项目建设协议。【原文：Dubai Crown Prince Sheikh Hamdan bin Mohammed bin Rashid al-Maktoum on Friday signed an agreement for construction of the Dubai Loop project with Elon Musk's infrastructure firm the Boring Company, Dubai Media Office said in a statement.】

item.title: 宝莱坞音乐厂牌寻求在印度版权诉讼中挑战 OpenAI
item.description: 法律文件显示，从T-Series到Saregama和索尼等一批印度顶级宝莱坞音乐厂牌正寻求加入在新德里对OpenAI提起的版权诉讼，这凸显了人们对不当使用录音来训练人工智能模型的担忧。【原文：A group of India's top Bollywood music labels, from T-Series to Saregama and Sony, is seeking to join a copyright lawsuit against OpenAI in New Delhi, highlighting worries about improper use of recordings to train AI models, legal documents show.】

item.title: 中国信息通信研究院称，12月中国外资品牌手机出货量同比增长0.6
item.description: 据一家隶属于政府的研究公司周五公布的数据，包括苹果公司 iPhone 在内的外国品牌智能手机 12 月份在中国的出货量同比增长了 0.6%。【原文：Shipments of foreign-branded smartphones, including Apple Inc's iPhone, in China rose 0.6% in December year-on-year, according to data released on Friday by a government-affiliated research firm.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 HealthCo 公司称 HMC Capital 是 Healthscope 医院的收购者之一
item.description: 澳大利亚 HealthCo Healthcare and Wellness 房地产投资信托基金周五表示，由 David Di Pilla 的 HMC Capital 牵头的一个财团已就收购 Healthscope 医院的可能性与其进行了接洽。【原文：Australia's HealthCo Healthcare and Wellness REIT said on Friday that a consortium led by David Di Pilla's HMC Capital had approached it for a possible buyout of Healthscope hospitals.】

item.title: 台湾环球晶圆（GlobalWafers）称未收到有关美国补贴变化的通知
item.description: 台湾环球晶圆公司首席执行官 Doris Hsu 周五表示，该公司尚未收到任何通知，表明美国《CHIPS 法案》规定的补贴协议即将修改。【原文：Taiwan's GlobalWafers has not received any notifications indicating upcoming modifications to agreed subsidies under the U.S. CHIPS Act, CEO Doris Hsu said on Friday.】

item.title: 柏金包制造商爱马仕年末销售额大增
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团爱马仕（Hermes）周五公布的第四季度销售额增长了18%，显示出富裕购物者对最昂贵的奢侈品（如售价高达1万美元的Birkin包）的旺盛需求。【原文：French luxury group Hermes reported an 18% rise in fourth quarter sales on Friday, showing robust appetite from wealthy shoppers for the most expensive luxury items like its Birkin bags, which cost upwards of $10,000.】

item.title: 高盛上调 12 个月 STOXX 600 指数预期
item.description: 周五，高盛（Goldman Sachs）上调了欧洲 STOXX 600 指数 12 个月的价格预期，称风险溢价降低、能源价格下降、消费者信心增强和经济增长强劲等因素是主要推动力。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised its 12-month price forecast for Europe's STOXX 600 index on Friday, citing factors such as lower risk premium, reduced energy prices, improved consumer confidence, and stronger economic growth as the key drivers.】
